# vrobots

Flatbuffers = 23.6.26

VRobot Bridge

```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.vrobots_bridge.vr_main_srv
```

VRobot Client

```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.vrobots_clients.vr_client
```

VRobot Graph Tool
```
python -m ubicoders_vrobots.vrobots_graph_tools.main_graph_runner
```
